trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for a Web server control <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>.
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem> provides a base class for toolbox items that create Web server controls.
This class extends <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and provides the following additional methods:
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolAttributeValue%2A> gets the value of an attribute of the toolbox item.
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolHtml%2A> gets the HTML that represents the initial state of the control.
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.GetToolType%2A> gets the type of the associated runtime component.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class using the provided type.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem.DisplayName%2A> is set to a short version of the type name.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the tool for this toolbox item.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref> class using the provided <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref>.
A SerializationInfo object containing information needed to instantiate the Web control through deserialization.
A StreamingContext object.
Creates objects from each type contained in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref>, and adds them to the specified designer.

<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore%2A> always throws an exception, indicating that the method is inherited from <xref:System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem> and only intended for use with Windows Forms.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
An array of created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> objects.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem.CreateComponentsCore(System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost)"></xref> method is only available in Windows Forms.
Loads the state of the toolbox item from the specified serialization information object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that describes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
Gets the value of the specified type of attribute of the toolbox item.
The default implementation will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the `attributeType` parameter is anything other than a <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistChildrenAttribute>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
The type of attribute to retrieve the value of.
The value of the specified type of attribute.
The attributeType parameter is not a .
Gets the HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
The HTML for the Web control that the tool creates.
Gets the type of this toolbox item.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> for the current design document.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of this toolbox item.
Initializes this toolbox item.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the Web server control toolbox item.
Saves the state of the toolbox item to the specified serialization information object.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> used to save the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControlToolboxItem"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that indicates the serialization stream characteristics.
